category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECustomViewPropertiesToEdit
preference.preference_description: Defines the BOM line properties that can be edited in the main and child header sections in the Custom view in the Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP) application. Valid values are the internal name of the BOM line property. Only string type properties are supported. Examples: "bl_rev_object_desc", "bl_item_object_desc", "bl_sequence_no".
